game.name: Hypnosis Knight-Princess
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Gina is set to take over as the new ruler of the Kingdom of Triss following her father's death..But her brother Morgan has other plans. Determined to stop her, Morgan enlists the help of the demon Lala to cast a hypnotic curse on his sister, hoping she relinquishes the crown to him. However...
game.shortDescriptionEn: Gina is set to take over as the new ruler of the Kingdom of Triss following her father's death..But her brother Morgan has other plans. Determined to stop her, Morgan enlists the help of the demon Lala to cast a hypnotic curse on his sister, hoping she relinquishes the crown to him. However...

reviewHighlights.text: 야 9/10 겜 7/10 요약: 겜 쉽고 낫벳. 일러 취향 맞으면 구매할만함. -패치 오류뜨시는분들 (윈10 기준)- 제어판 > 날짜, 시간 또는 숫자 형식 변경 > 관리자 옵션 > 유니코드(시스템 로캘 변경) > 영어(미국) > 패치 진행 > 완료 후 다시 변경
